poem:
Title: In the Palette of Politics

Unopposed, von der Leyen strides,
In halls of power where silence abides.
Votes are voiceless, politics a coy dance,
Where absence is strategy, silence an advance.
At 65, still she does not rest,
Chasing dreams on Europe's broad chest.
Democracy's seesaw, a game so deft,
One moment in light, the next in heft.
